website_summaries.verdict: The Enclave CineHome HD may not look or feel like a $1,000 home-theater system, but the sound, at least by wireless standards, is pretty good.
pros: The Enclave CineHome HD is an easy-to-install "wireless" 5.1 surround speaker system that sounds better than most sound bars
The rear bi-poles are a nice touch
The subwoofer is large and provides the sound with real guts
cons: Performance and build quality don't come close to wired systems
We wish the Enclave CineHome HD had tone controls, and adjusting the volume of the subwoofer isn't straightforward

customer_reviews.title: “Oh! You got surround  sound.”
customer_reviews.text: So, the other day a buddy of mine was over and watching a movie with me. A sound blared out; he jump and looked my way, saw the speaker behind my large head, and said: “Oh! You got surround sound. Maneeeee, I thought something had hit the side of your house.” Comments like these, I think, speak for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jake Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have been rock solid, and the sound from them is amazing. I was a bit skeptical at first due to so many problems with wireless in general.
customer_reviews.author: Nevin Absher

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product I would recommend it again. The sound is amazing and the wireless makes it convenient to put up anywhere in the home.
customer_reviews.author: teddy m gorospe

customer_reviews.title: What a system for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and so much better than my soundbar! Feels like I’m at the stadium for the NBA Playoffs with surround sound. Simple, quick (24 minutes) set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality build, quality sound and performance
customer_reviews.text: Looked at lots of reviews and had it narrowed down to two wireless systems. I have been very happy with this system, lots of plug ins but the sound is amazing for a wireless system. Easy to hook up, and I have had no issues with connections as some reviews claim. I really like the multiple inputs/outputs and that you are able to use without a receiver. Only issue I have had is connecting some devices via Bluetooth, I only tried the first day and haven’t tried again so not sure if it was user error. It hasn’t been something I needed a lot so no big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Enclave Audio CineHome HD 5.1 Wireles
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3 stars because the sound quality is great plus the fact that it is all of the powered speakers are wireless IF it is not of those features i could have given 1 star easily. Because a lot of missing useful things like extra output for headphone maybe or extra speakers. There is no port for any update so that the remote (cheap flimsy remote) can work properly. Every time you will change HDMI Input you have to wait at least 5 minutes for "Toggle" or On/Off before the right input and the sound comes out. Very Frustrating. Plus it is not cheap, pricy i don't mind if these normal things is working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MonJ

customer_reviews.title: Adequate surround sound system
customer_reviews.text: While having a wireless surround sound system is great, everytime I turn it on, I always have to reset the speakers because they do not all come on when I first turn on the system...its very frustrating. Some also lose connection now and then. The remote control also seems very flimsy. Again, while convenient, I'm not sure I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to install, it has good sound. The black power cords are... unsightly dangling down the walls, wish they'd put white cords on the speakers since they know we're going to have to string them down the walls to AC outlets from every single speaker. If you switch between HDMI and the TV (using Netflix or Hulu) it requires that you re-turn-on the base unit or it just... doesn't have sound. Something about going to the other app makes it think you've put it into sleep mode. While annoying, it's a 'okay we'll get used to it' sort of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and sounds amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and sounds amazing. This company truly cares about their customers. Rob was amazing and went above and beyond to make sure everything was to my satisfaction. Absolutely love it!! Sounds amazing! Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best and only choice from a sound snob
customer_reviews.text: I work as a Sound Designer and Re-Recording Mixer for film and this little 5.1 was everything I could have hoped for out of a Home Theater System. I’ve played back films that I’ve worked on and the enclave mirrors what we created on a Dub Stage in the home environment beautifully. The only thing that could make it better would be a EQ to battle any frequency build up in untreated living rooms, but from my experience, it sounds fantastic even without it. If you don’t trust the quality of sound bars like me and want a truly wireless, easy to set up system that sounds great; This is your one and only choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ando Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sound great. Easy to set-up
customer_reviews.text: Very neat and clean look. Sound great. Easy to set-up! Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: scott cannon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Got this product after reading few reviews that its great. When I got it, I was having some issues with setup, called support and found out that they don't work on the weekends, I need to send them an email and they will get back to me but no live support to help. I have used high quality products and sound is like coming from some plastic box, not clear and does feel natural. Base wasn't there either, I tried messing with setting but that didn't help either. Overall, I was not impress with the sound quality or the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Faiz Imran

customer_reviews.title: Product is better than company
customer_reviews.text: Product is a decent product with decent sound but company and customer service are the worst. Tech support wants to schedule appointment through email and you cannot connect with a person. Worst customer service and tech support I have encountered. Person I finally spoke with was extremely rude and condescending.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Coast

customer_reviews.title: Support is a joke
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this system does not have a remote control app. Tech support is useless. They tell you only the cinehub2 has an app. So if you buy this one you have to use the remote they supply thru the tv and no way to download updated firmware. So maybe they should tell you before you spend $800 that this system is outdated with no support. The only support they give you is , you bought the wrong system. System is 5 years old yet they continue to sell it. That’s like buying an iPhone 5 for $800.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The system I received did not work as advertised with our LG tv. The performance was inconsistent from day to day and I will advise those considering this type of system to research a good quality a/v receiver where the the front speakers (and subwoofer) can be hardwired (easy) and the rear speakers be setup wirelessly (need a wireless controller for only the rear speakers. Amazon should discontinue selling this misadvertised product.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Rolfson

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The super easy installation does not outweigh the disappointing sound quality it produces. We have a Vizio 5.1 Soundbar that costs half what this system costs and sounds 10 times better. The front speakers and subwoofer are huge, I mean huge! Not sure why... It does not produce a lot of sound either. I tried to get myself to keep it because I'm a fan of startups, but the wireless technology does not come even close to the quality of sound produced by any of the 3 wired systems we have. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely purchase again and would recommend to any family or friend
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding performance and sound. Spread them around the room, plug`em in. then listen to theatre sound @ hame. They synced right up, and all controls on the TV remote work for all connected devices. Clear, rich 5.1 sound fills our 15 X 21 home theatre with horsepower to spare. Would definitely purchase again and would recommend to any family or friend. I believe this product is slightly overpriced given the POS remote and the commodore64 style system control in OSD, but the sound makes it so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: RBI

customer_reviews.title: Sounds pretty good, but very buggy.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this system. It did set up fairly easy, although it took some tweaking of my TV settings to finally work. Sound was pretty good and I was enjoying the simplicity of it. However it kept loosing it's connection to the speakers and sometimes it would loose sound altogether. I would have to run the speaker calibration again or completely power cycle the system several times a day. So for that reason I returned it. I decided to go with a more traditional theater system with wired speakers and more functionality. For the money I would expect this system to have more of the kinks worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: remote does not work
customer_reviews.text: I need to revise my review. amazon has been great with the problem I am having with this system. they are replacing the system with a new one. the speaker system sounds fantastic, the only problem is with the remote. it works sometimes and then not. I hope the new system does not have this problem. amazon told me that if it did, I could return it. thanks amazon !!! I will update this review after the new system arrives.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This thing is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great...but man, this is extremely bulky! It's so big, with all of the huge power supplies, I just sent it back. I couldn't get myself to keep it. Nice to have that REAL surround sound...but it was just way too huge. We went with a 5.1 soundbar with virtual surround. The experience is just fine for home movies and, at only 3 inches tall right under my TV, it's way more sleek. So, I'd love to love this a lot more...but just can't. Last item of note, emailing the company for support seemed pretty lackluster compared to other companies I've dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: John D Del Valle

customer_reviews.title: Great System!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second effort to review this. Hope doesn't show up twice. Wanted wireless, need mobile so we can move around. Took 15 minutes to set up. Yes you still have electric cords but those are very manageable. What's important is no speaker wires, the center console really delivers sophisticated management. Budget was set by the boss and I found this and am so pleased. Movies, voices problems. No more and surround sound is beautiful. Bluetooth used my Samsung S6 to get Enclave app and download new firmware. I have talked with Rob at Enclave, feels more like a family. I look forward to many hours of pleasant movies watching!
customer_reviews.author: Brad R

customer_reviews.title: Simple set up, great sound! Well done Enclave.
customer_reviews.text: Easily a 5 star product. This was by far the easiest system to hook up. It took me longer to get out of the boxes than it took to set up. True surround sound that blows the sound bar I had out of the water. Great, full sound that was easily set up with my 4K LG TV. Simple and easy to use plus it works great! I will absolutely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for my girlfriend that needed a wireless system because she has no carpet to hide speaker wires.
customer_reviews.text: Works right out of the box! Found a wall plug for each speaker. Had to buy two HDMI cables to replace the RCA cables. Having trouble connecting a Sony blue ray player with HDMI, will work on that this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gould

customer_reviews.title: Get this product if you love dealing with issues:)
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. Issues switching inputs just about every time I do so. Mostly a problem with the video and/or sound not coming through. Have had this for 4 months and procrastinating sending it back because it would be such a pain to do so due to the size and amount of equipment. If you're not somewhat decent at troubleshooting dont get this product
customer_reviews.author: Dylan johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around
customer_reviews.text: The ease of set-up for this product was incredible. The instructions around the ARC port were very helpful and very useful as I had no idea about any of that. The sound is great. The biggest selling point for me so far has been the customer service. There was a problem with one of the speakers that I received in the box, and they shipped me a replacement when I reached out to them in very little time. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This is the best wireless home theater system that I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Sound= Great lows and highs Installation= easier than plugging in your phone Some of the best packaging I have ever seen. Have not had to use the tech support yet.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and quality
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use and sound quality was better than expected as I was pre-warned about possible delay in feedback fromsurround speakers. I did not experience any of that. The only reason for reducing to 4 star is that after setup, the left front speaker wireless chip malfunctioned and caused a request for support. The support was excellent with immediate response and replacement shipped. Also as everyone else mentioned, the remote is a downturn. Would appreciate a design improvement on the interface with a possible volume and input LED or LCD.
customer_reviews.author: Shahir

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality surround sound!
customer_reviews.text: Because my television lacks an HDMI audio output, I am unable to display the volume on the screen & the remote is only useful for the most basic functions. I am pleased with the sound quality, however the volume isn't loud enough from some inputs. It is too loud for my condo. I,ve had two complaints from a neighbor who threatens to go to the condo association next! Bi g waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Warsop

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Once it finally works its ok. Turn it on, off, on, off, on to finally get the picture and sound to work together. Called customer service didn't get much if any help. Was given strange suggestions that did not work. Sorry we waited too long to be able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Martin

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: The system works well. Not having to run speaker wires was a big plus. It is nicely sized, And decent sound quality for our smaller living room. The wireless allows us to locate the sub woofer anywhere in the room, out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Panthera

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: No this is a purchase that I was kind of leery about purchasing but I’m glad I did because it’s exactly what I wanted for a long time and finally I was able to find me something at a reasonable price but great quality.
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeE

customer_reviews.title: Only wish it hadn't dropped $200 the day after I purchased...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, use your HDMI arc connection if you have one. Update your firmware after initial setup, using the mobile app, I had to reset my speaker connections afterwards, but it solved a couple issues I had encountered.
customer_reviews.author: TheOnlyPenguin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, Timely support!
customer_reviews.text: My dad was the first one to order this product and I asked him what the new system he bought when I went over for the fourth of July this year. After listening to the system for most the evening I had to get myself one and I have absolutely no regrets! Great sound, bass, and control. Hard to find a quality true bluetooth 5:1 sound system. Absolutely recommend this product if you're on the fence comparing to the giants of speakers out there (Bose, etc)!
customer_reviews.author: Hunterjones

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound & Service
customer_reviews.text: Be careful on the configuration depending on what type of TV you have (1080p, 1080i, 4K, etc) and use the tech service guys to help you out. Watch their setup videos too. They’re great. Sound is also great.
customer_reviews.author: seanzee182

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre support
customer_reviews.text: When it's working and recognised it's perfect, but when it's not, the support is useless and mediocre. Doesn't work with windows laptops nor macbooks.
customer_reviews.author: Romain

customer_reviews.title: cannot get system to work
customer_reviews.text: Tech support is not helpful at all, I will be returning product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound impressive customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and amazing sound and most importantly impressive customer service. Thanks to Rob for solving remote control issue, promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Vsam

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE: $1k doorstop
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap that doesn't work immediately out of the box. None of the speakers will connect wirelessly and the troubleshooting is a joke
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: An easy to set up wireless surround sound system.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very easy system to set up and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Cady

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: Though I thought it was expensive, it has performed really well. Would buy it again, and have told others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, shame about the software.
customer_reviews.text: I do really love my Enclave audio system, the sound is great and I love that its so convenient to move the speakers around, even I take one out in the garden sometimes. Unfortunately the software is really quite basic and often crashes. The interface on the TV is like something from a 1980s computer and sometimes it refuses to respond. The remote control also looks like it been made by fisherPrice and has a cheap feel to it. Overall happy but sometimes the software drives me crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would HIGHLY recommend the Enclave Audio CineHome
customer_reviews.text: I would HIGHLY recommend the Enclave Audio CineHome. The sound is AMAZING and the wireless makes it easy to put anywhere in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was top notch. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. Had a little trouble syncing it with our TV. But customer service is awesome!!! The sound was amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good System
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Great sound and easy setup CONS: the only thing you can adjust is volume
customer_reviews.author: Loofa

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great wireless solution
customer_reviews.text: It's a little finicky, and setting up with ARC takes some trial and error, but sounds great once you get going and get used to the quirks. Only issue that I had was the subwoofer power adapter making a whistling sound. They sent a new one out at no charge. Tech support is responsive. It seems they use a network of independent home theater companies that call you back and walk you through issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad of a product!
customer_reviews.text: good system. Reason I knocked off one star is volumn bar does not show on TV when using remote to adjust volumn. Quite frustrating actually.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality for price
customer_reviews.text: This system was easy to set up and works great! It did take me awhile to realize that I needed more cords to make the speakers work. It only comes with an HDMI cord and you need the audio/video cords to hear the sound. Other than that it has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C. Cary

customer_reviews.title: easy install  I would have gave it a five if I was not over charged
customer_reviews.text: i bought this in the middle of Feb this year I paid 800.00 dollars for it. now it's selling for 500.00 im kinda pissed I think I should get a refund but it is a good system
customer_reviews.author: clifton dean stafford

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install & Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Speakers are plug-and-play with minimal effort. Great sound and overall experience. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Interference
customer_reviews.text: We have a smart tv we use with this but get interference from it .still trying to figure it out what's causing the tv to go bonkers
customer_reviews.author: big Al

customer_reviews.title: Extremely simple to set up
customer_reviews.text: Literally plug-and-play, I set up in a few minutes and just plug everything in and it worked. Unlike my previous system that took me an entire day of running wires. The sound quality is good I just wish it had more adjustments for the tone and difference Surround types
customer_reviews.author: Jay K.

customer_reviews.title: Wildly unintuitive central control and app
customer_reviews.text: Couldnt be more disappointed (aside from sound quality which is great). You have to fidget with this thing in 100 different ways to get a mix of phone bluetooth and tv connected. Wildly unintuitive for 2020. Change my mind enclave tech support, you have my number!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the system the main speaker wouldn’t connect. I contacted the company and they sent me a new one without much hassle. 4 stars only because of the initial problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPOINTED NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Speakers lose connection all the time need to unplug or disconnect everything
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Eslava

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s literally plug and go! Hassle free set up! Sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: set it up exactly like the instructions say
customer_reviews.text: the sound quality is great, makes watching old movies fun. good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Garry Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable for a top of the line system.
customer_reviews.text: I have looked at a lot of other systems but this was hard to beat for the money. It is a great value for an in home theater system. Very simple to set up. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell if it is on or off but enjoy the system
customer_reviews.author: Madison1111

customer_reviews.title: All's well that ends well.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't as smooth as advertised, but tech support was responsive and was very helpful. A bit of a bummer followed by a wow! All's well that ends well.
customer_reviews.author: dsp

customer_reviews.title: Never give up! Just have to figure it out
customer_reviews.text: Ok I figured this system out. I was having trouble with the speakers cutting in and out. Then I took the Dolby prologic off auto and system plays perfect!!!!!!!! Loving this thing now!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Great value and no speaker wires to deal with
customer_reviews.text: Loving this system! Great value and no speaker wires to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: good but complicated
customer_reviews.text: the speakers were awesome. but the tech support and directions leave much to be desired. it was difficult to get it going, but once we did, it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price! Very easy to set up. Sound quality is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: It turns off randomly. Defective system.
customer_reviews.text: Although the audio is great, this system has been malfunctioning since day one. It turns off randomly when you are watching TV. It's really annoying. Also, Enclave customer support won't respond to emails.
customer_reviews.author: Top13

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this set up. I experienced a problem initially and experienced the absolute best customer service I've ever had and I'm 64!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoelscher

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought system for another location and am very pleased with the ease of setting up and the overall sound performance. Great sound and a lot of my friends are intrigued by the system once they hear the sound (and even more so when realize it is wireless). Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This audio system was easy to set up, and I'm very happy with the sound and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen Puri

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic system for the price it’s sold for. Easy setup and if needed their technical support is outstanding. They’ll even follow up with a call a week or two later to make sure everything is working correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: To much set up time and still not right. Product has many glitches and not ready for market yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good and will be great when I finish setting it ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good and will be great when I finish setting it up in my Harmony 650 remote........pending the call-back from Tech Support.
customer_reviews.author: William W Grady

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not awesome.
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars as in a 'B'. Easy setup as long as you have outlets. I do. Sound is good Have to hit volume too many times. No customization... you get the factory sound settings.
customer_reviews.author: Donavan L.

customer_reviews.title: !!! GLAD I BOUGHT THIS SYSTEM !!!
customer_reviews.text: This Enclave 5.1 system produces a very clean surround sound using the new WISA technology at a reasonable price. Only took about 15 minutes to open the boxes and set it up. If you are looking for a wireless system that doesn't break the bank and sounds really good then this is the one to buy....YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money when you're watching TV sounds like you're listening through tin can and also that the eye for the remote control is useless doesn't work well at all and for the price of the unit not worth the money. Sent it back the seller is awesome it's the product that's not worth it
customer_reviews.author: carrie w

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Dish. Tech support won't return our calls.
customer_reviews.text: We never could get the system to work properly for more than an hour at a time. It seems that their tech support department is aware that this system isn't compatible with certain Dish Network receivers. We purchased two of these systems and have tried everything we can think of. Their tech support phones are answered by voicemail and you have to leave a message to have someone call you back "shortly". We've called multiple times and have been waiting for a few days but no one will return our call. We finally returned both systems to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SusannaBee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with two right speakers and no rear speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wittenberger

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Remote doesn't link to cable service...wirless system is figity......not true surround....
customer_reviews.author: jairo

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design choice
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. All audio input wires (HDMI/optical audio/etc) need to be run to the front center speaker. You CANNOT have wires run in a closet or side area and simply place the speakers near power outlets/plug them in. Very poor design choice.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

product_meta.title: 2016 Enclave Audio CineHome HD 5.1 Wireless Home Theater System
product_meta.description:
At Enclave, we understand that half of the movie experience is heard and not seen. With the popularized sound bar audio solution, true surround sound is dismissed for convenience, ease of setup, and wiring issues. The Enclave Audio 5.1 WiSA Certified Wireless Home Theater System solves all that and more with uncompromising true wireless surround sound. The Enclave Smart Center connects to your TV with a single cable and will host HDMI and SPDIF (Optical) sources, including satellite, cable, streaming appliances, and gaming consoles. Included with the system is a wireless subwoofer, wireless rear speakers, wireless front speakers, a remote control, and the Enclave Audio Smart Center Speaker with ARC and CEC support.Note: The system works best with the left and right speakers either even with or in front of the center channel speaker. 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




TRUE 5.1 WIRE FREE HD AUDIO HOME THEATER Enclave Audio 5.1 wireless home theater system offers uncompromising true wireless surround sound with the ability to easily place your speakers as 5.1 surround was designed and intended. Surrounding you. Whether it is movies, music, sports, or video gaming, Enclave wirelessly surrounds you with every nuance of every sound, bringing your home theater experience to life as you've never heard it before. 

WIRELESS AUDIO REDEFINED - JUST UNBOX, POWER UP, AND GO Simply place your speakers in the appropriate location, plug in the speakers' AC power adaptors into any 110/220v power source, load up your Enclave Smart Center with audio sources, and the WiSA certified Enclave Audio system is ready to deliver 24 bit uncompressed audio wirelessly, straight out of the box with no configuration necessary. 




MULTIPLE INPUTS 3 HDMI inputs to connect your cable box, dish, gaming console, DVD-Blu Ray Player, Streaming appliance (Apple TV, Amazon Fire, Roku, etc.), HDMI pass-thru, CEC, and ARC are all supported. 

BIPOLE REAR SPEAKERS Each Enclave rear surround speaker contains two full-range drivers on opposing sides of the enclosure for a widespread, yet enveloping surround experience. 

Streaming and System Updates The Enclave Audio app for Android/iOS lets you stream music from your device, local network, or a selection of music services via Bluetooth or Googlecast (Chromecast required). Also update your Enclave Audio CineHome with the latest firmware releases for enhanced performance and feature additions. 




THE WIRELESS HOME THEATER REVOLUTION BEGINS NOW No more soundbars giving you lackluster audio performance, Wifi drop outs, or Bluetooth latency. The Enclave Audio CineHome HD brings crisp, clear sound to your music, movies and games with WiSA wireless technology found in audio systems costing up to $20,000! 




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Wireless. Surround. Sound.

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

While the rest of the consumer audio world was focused on making soundbars and whole house audio solutions, we found it quite discouraging that no one was focused on a single room true 5.1 wireless home theater experience. We believe half of the movie experience is heard and not seen so we took it upon ourselves to build what the market currently did not offer. The end result - an affordable, true 5.1, wireless HD audio surround sound system that you just unbox, plug in, and go.

What makes your product special?

Our product allows anyone with power outlets in their living room to enjoy a true 5.1 surround sound experience by having 6 independent speaker enclosures surround you with sound wirelessly, but with the simplicity of a sound bar set up. The WiSA Technology used in our system is found in systems that cost 5X - 20X as much, we are passionate about sound and knew that Wifi and Bluetooth audio transmission wasn't going to cut it. We worked tirelessly to incorporate this new technology, with speakers that were custom tuned to work with eachother at an incredible price. It doesn’t get easier than Enclave's plug and play setup experience with rock solid sound that packs a punch.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

The best part of our startup experience has been building a team with like-minded individuals and working together to bring to reality a product we had in our head, that the market had a need for, and our customers thank us for.
feature_bullets: ELIMINATES THE NEED FOR AUDIO/VIDEO RECEIVER OR SPEAKER CABLES: The Enclave Smart Center serves as the central hub saving money and space without the need for an additional Audio/Video Receiver or running speaker any speaker cable.

CUSTOM DESIGNED AND TUNED HD AUDIO WiSA SPEAKERS: Listen to 360 degrees of 24 bit HD wireless audio. Each Enclave rear surround speaker contains two full-range drivers on opposing sides of the enclosure for a widespread, enveloping surround experience.

DOLBY DIGITAL AND DTS: Delivers an intense, cinema-like surround sound, even from stereo signals. For the those who prefer uncompressed audio, 5.1 channels of LPCM 24 bit uncompressed audio seamlessly surround you with zero lip-sync issues.

HDMI INPUT: 3 HDMI inputs to connect your cable box, dish, gaming console, DVD-Blu Ray Player, Streaming appliance (Apple TV, Amazon Fire, Roku, etc.), HDMI pass-thru, CEC, and ARC are all supported. Power Supply : AC-100-240 Volt,50-60Hz

3.5mm ANALOG, OPTICAL and BLUETOOTH INPUT: Use almost any signal type. Use the Enclave Audio app for Android/iOS to stream music from your device, local network, or a selection of music services via Bluetooth or Google Cast. (Chromecast required)
